questions.question:
Answer the questions given below (refer Fig.1):


Fig. 1. Circuit configuration of AC voltage controller.


1. Which of the following cannot be used as a fully controlled AC-voltage controller
2. The DC component in asymmetrical AC voltage controller with SCR controlling in positive half cycle and Diode conducting in negative half cycle will be

answers.d: Equal to peak value of AC input voltage

questions.question: 3. A single phase AC voltage controller is used to convert:

answers.a: Fixed AC voltage to variable magnitude AC voltage of same frequency
answers.b: Fixed AC voltage to variable frequency AC voltage of same magnitude
answers.c: Fixed AC voltage to variable magnitude AC voltage of variable frequency
answers.d: Fixed AC voltage to variable magnitude DC voltage of same frequency

questions.question: 4. What will be the relation between firing angle (α), extinction angle (β) and conduction angle (γ)?
5. What will be the effect of using diode in place of SCR-T<sub>1</sub>?

answers.b: Output voltage will be controlled in positive half cycle but it will be zero in negative half cycle.
answers.c: Output voltage can be controlled only in negative half cycle of AC input voltage.
answers.d: SCR-T<sub>1</sub> will operate in both positive and negative half cycles.
